name: Wp-history-monitor
tagline: Monitors the changes made by the user to Posts, Pages and Users.
body:
### Wp-History-Monitor

This handy plugin, with simple interface, allows you to monitor history of posts, pages and user's details.

### Features

* View history of posts, pages and user's details.
* View status of posts and pages.

### Screenshots

![Front gui of wp-history plugin](https://github.com/OsmosysSoftware/wp-history-monitor/blob/gh-pages/images/firstimage.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
